title: What are some developing leadership skills in students? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, Leadership is not a skill, it is a quality of an individual to perform in such a way that a group starts to accept him/her as their leader. This are Qualities that are either inherited or can be acquired by consistent efforts. So Some Developing leadership Qualities in Students must be Social AdjustmentSocial AdaptabilityCooperationSense of ResponsibilityPlanning and OrganizingEffective IntelligenceReasoning AbilityOrganizing AbilityPower of ExpressionSocial EffectivenessInitiativeSelf ConfidenceSpeed of DecisionAbility to influence the groupLivelinessDynamicDeterminationCourageStaminaMental StaminaPhysical StaminaNote:- A leader also Appreciates the work of other people so kindly upvote if you like my answer.

Leadership skills are covered in just 2 areas for students. Self-belief: That I can lead when the oppurtunity presents itself.Preparation: That I have invested my time and efforts to prepare myself to lead.When students especially teenagers (age 12 to 19) are carefully groomed on the above two, they become the best leaders they can be, inspire people around them and achieve extraordinary results.
